title: The video shows a church in the US during an online Easter service in April 2020
subtitle: A video has been viewed thousands of times in multiple posts on Facebook and YouTube alongside a claim it shows an empty church in Italy after almost all of its congregants died from the novel coronavirus. The claim is false; the video shows a church in the US state of Mississippi during an online Easter service in April 2020.
author: checamos.afp.com
